013package org.apache.juneau.bean.openapi3;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.internal.ConverterUtils.*;
019
020import java.net.*;
021import java.util.*;
022
023import org.apache.juneau.*;
024import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026
027/**
028 * License information for the exposed API.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * The License Object provides license information for the exposed API. This information helps clients understand 
032 * the terms under which the API can be used, including any restrictions or requirements.
033 *
034 * <h5 class='section'>OpenAPI Specification:</h5>
035 * <p>
036 * The License Object is composed of the following fields:
037 * <ul class='spaced-list'>
038 *    <li><c>name</c> (string, REQUIRED) - The license name used for the API
039 *    <li><c>url</c> (string) - A URL to the license used for the API
040 * </ul>
041 *
042 * <h5 class='section'>Example:</h5>
043 * <p class='bcode'>
044 *    <jc>// Construct using SwaggerBuilder.</jc>
045 *    License <jv>x</jv> = <jsm>license</jsm>(<js>"Apache 2.0"</js>, <js>"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"</js>);
046 *
047 *    <jc>// Serialize using JsonSerializer.</jc>
048 *    String <jv>json</jv> = Json.<jsm>from</jsm>(<jv>x</jv>);
049 *
050 *    <jc>// Or just use toString() which does the same as above.</jc>
051 *    String <jv>json</jv> = <jv>x</jv>.toString();
052 * </p>
053 * <p class='bcode'>
054 *    <jc>// Output</jc>
055 *    {
056 *       <js>"name"</js>: <js>"Apache 2.0"</js>,
057 *       <js>"url"</js>: <js>"http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html"</js>
058 *    }
059 * </p>
060 *
061 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
062 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.0.0#license-object">OpenAPI Specification &gt; License Object</a>
063 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://swagger.io/docs/specification/api-general-info/">OpenAPI API General Info</a>
064 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanOpenApi3">juneau-bean-openapi-v3</a>
065 * </ul>
066 */
067public class License extends OpenApiElement {
068
069   private String name;
070   private URI url;
071
072   /**
073    * Default constructor.
074    */
075   public License() {}
076
077   /**
078    * Copy constructor.
079    *
080    * @param copyFrom The object to copy.
081    */
082   public License(License copyFrom) {
083      super(copyFrom);
084
085      this.name = copyFrom.name;
086      this.url = copyFrom.url;
087   }
088
089   /**
090    * Make a deep copy of this object.
091    *
092    * @return A deep copy of this object.
093    */
094   public License copy() {
095      return new License(this);
096   }
097
098   /**
099    * Bean property getter:  <property>name</property>.
100    *
101    * <p>
102    * The license name used for the API.
103    *
104    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
105    */
106   public String getName() {
107      return name;
108   }
109
110   /**
111    * Bean property setter:  <property>name</property>.
112    *
113    * <p>
114    * The license name used for the API.
115    *
116    * @param value
117    *    The new value for this property.
118    *    <br>Property value is required.
119    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
120    * @return This object
121    */
122   public License setName(String value) {
123      name = value;
124      return this;
125   }
126
127   /**
128    * Bean property getter:  <property>url</property>.
129    *
130    * <p>
131    * A URL to the license used for the API.
132    *
133    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
134    */
135   public URI getUrl() {
136      return url;
137   }
138
139   /**
140    * Bean property setter:  <property>url</property>.
141    *
142    * <p>
143    * A URL to the license used for the API.
144    *
145    * @param value
146    *    The new value for this property.
147    *    <br>URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
148    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
149    * @return This object
150    */
151   public License setUrl(URI value) {
152      url = value;
153      return this;
154   }
155
156   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
157   public <T> T get(String property, Class<T> type) {
158      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
159      return switch (property) {
160         case "name" -> toType(getName(), type);
161         case "url" -> toType(getUrl(), type);
162         default -> super.get(property, type);
163      };
164   }
165
166   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
167   public License set(String property, Object value) {
168      assertArgNotNull("property", property);
169      return switch (property) {
170         case "name" -> setName(Utils.s(value));
171         case "url" -> setUrl(toURI(value));
172         default -> {
173            super.set(property, value);
174            yield this;
175         }
176      };
177   }
178
179   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
180   public Set<String> keySet() {
181      var s = setBuilder(String.class)
182         .addIf(name != null, "name")
183         .addIf(url != null, "url")
184         .build();
185      return new MultiSet<>(s, super.keySet());
186   }
187
188   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
189   public License strict() {
190      super.strict();
191      return this;
192   }
193
194   @Override /* Overridden from OpenApiElement */
195   public License strict(Object value) {
196      super.strict(value);
197      return this;
198   }
199
200}
